title: Drawing, "A Walking Girl, a Crouching Chicken, and the American Falls on Niagara River", possibly 1856
markings: Verso:  Stamped at center:  Lugt 457d, noir
description: Horizontal view of the falls shown closer than in 1917-4-149-a,with a girl shown from the right back, at left, and a crouching chicken, at center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Walking Girl, a Crouching Chicken, and the American Falls on Niagara River", possibly 1856.
possibly 1856. Graphite on green paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-149-b.
